channel.title: DNS Record :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: PHASE 5: POINT OFFICIAL DOMAIN (DNS RECORD) Go to Route 53 > Hosted zones > sgutodolist.com. Create Record for Root domain: Click Create record. Record name: (leave blank). Type: A. Alias: Yes (Swipe the button to the right). Route traffic to: Alias ​​to CloudFront distribution. Choose distribution: Select the CloudFront domain (e.g. d123...cloudfront.net). Click Create records. Create Record for WWW: Do the same, but fill in www for Record name. ⬅ STEP 5: S3 Policy STEP 7: Deploy and Test ➡
